faqs.question: How often will I get a new bouquet?
faqs.answer: You can choose the frequency that works best for you—weekly, bi-weekly, or monthly. We’ll make sure fresh flowers arrive regularly, just as you scheduled.

faqs.question: Can i send subscription like as a gift ?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! Just enter the recipient’s name and address during checkout, and we’ll deliver beautiful flowers straight to their door with your chosen message.

faqs.question: Can I choose which bouquet I get ?
faqs.answer: Each delivery is a curated surprise featuring seasonal blooms. While you can't select specific bouquets in advance, every arrangement is designed to impress.

faqs.question: Can I change the shipping address ?
faqs.answer: Yes! You can update the shipping address anytime through your account settings—just make sure to do it before the next delivery date.

faqs.question: What day will the subscription bouquet come?
faqs.answer: Delivery days depend on your location and subscription plan, but you’ll get a notification before each shipment so you can plan ahead.

faqs.question: Can I suspend my subscription to flowers ?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can pause or skip a delivery whenever you need to. Just log into your account and update your subscription schedule.
